about_the_game:
All In on Love: A High-Stakes Romance

Experience the Thrill of the Game and the Heat of Passion

Dive into a world of high-stakes poker, glamorous women, and intense romance in this thrilling DLC for Virtual Girl. This adult-themed expansion offers a unique opportunity to date stunning women in the exclusive setting of a Gentleman's Club.

About Poker Room:

  • Intense Romance: Develop deep connections with captivating characters, each with their own unique personality and desires.

  • Glamorous Setting: Immerse yourself in the luxurious atmosphere of a Gentleman's Club, complete with elegant decor and exclusive perks.

  • Steamy Encounters: Engage in passionate and intimate moments with your chosen love interest.

  • Multiple Endings: Make your choices that will shape the course of your romantic journey and determine your ultimate fate.

Perfect for Fans of:

  • Visual novels

  • Dating simulators

  • Adult games

  • Drama and romance

Don't miss your chance to experience the thrill of high-stakes love. Purchase the DLC today and let the game begin!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains full nudity, front and back of several all characters

You can set up a scene and simulate sex with a 3D model.

The animations simulate sexual positions, and it is possible to move the camera freely around the scene, having a complete perspective of the sexual act.

There is nothing forced in the game.

All situations and characters were made just to simulate pleasure in a passionate and light way.

It is possible to see in detail the characters facial expressions and erogenous zones, including genitalias. 

You must be legal age of majority or over to play this game.
